docs.text: Welcome to "How to learn test automation" Test automation is huge, it is done for different layers/stacks of the application. While everyone learns based on their unique context and environments, we could all use a bit of initial guidance and help when first breaking into a specific focus area within the field. Our Goal This repository hopes/aims to be a community driven reference guide for that goal with curated list of resources What are some of the blog posts, Newsletters, YouTube videos, Courses, Podcasts that are insightful, stand out and taught you a unique concept within Test automation? Let's put that here and file it under the required category. Categories Tech Focussed on a series of resources to learn about these vast areas on how to actually go about the technical implementations Web Mobile Backend Accessibility Security Test runners Community Resources on the larger Testing and automation community which help to support, while also forming the basis for providing a lot of this content and from where we all learn 🙏 Leadership People to follow Community Podcasts
